abstract: The company multiplied its spending by three from 2010 to 2013, and again in 2014, spending at least $4.2 million and as much as $4.8 million last year, according to its latest disclosure report.
snippet: The company multiplied its spending by three from 2010 to 2013, and again in 2014, spending at least $4.2 million and as much as $4.8 million last year, according to its latest disclosure report.
lead_paragraph: LONDON — Google tripled its spending on lobbying in Brussels last year, most likely making it one of the largest spenders in the administrative center of the European Union.

headline.main: Google Tripled Spending on Lobbying in Brussels Last Year
headline.print_headline: Google Spends Big on E.U. Lobbying
